# [A Very Big Sum](https://www.hackerrank.com/challenges/a-very-big-sum/problem?isFullScreen=true)
## Easy
<div class="challenge-body-html"><div class="challenge_problem_statement"><div class="msB challenge_problem_statement_body"><div class="hackdown-content"><svg style="display: none;"><defs id="MathJax_SVG_glyphs"></defs></svg><p>In this challenge, you need to calculate and print the sum of elements in an array, considering that some integers may be very large.</p>
